title: ai-ctx Global Configuration
description: Schema for the global ai-ctx configuration file.

lastGlobalGitignoreSync.description: Timestamp (ISO 8601) of the last successful synchronization of the global gitignore list.

lastGitignoreCommitId.description: Commit ID of the github/gitignore repository at the time of the last sync.

globalGitignoreRepoUrl.description: URL of the git repository to sync global gitignore patterns from.

ignore.description: Settings related to ignoring files and directories.

additionalPatterns.description: List of additional gitignore-like patterns to always ignore globally.

additionalGitignoreUrls.description: List of URLs pointing to additional .gitignore files to fetch and include.

useProjectGitignore.description: Whether to respect project-specific .gitignore files by default.

useGlobalGitignore.description: Whether to use the synchronized global gitignore list by default.

allowedDotFolders.description: List of dot folders (like .github, .vscode) that should NOT be ignored by default.

output.description: Settings related to the output file.

defaultPath.description: Default path for the output file if not specified via CLI.

includeFileHeaders.description: Whether to include file path headers (--- FILE: ... ---) in the output.

includeMetadata.description: Whether to include initial metadata (mappings, library notes) in the output.

fileMode.description: Settings specific to file processing mode (following imports).

defaultImportDepth.description: Default depth for following imports. -1 for infinite.

defaultParallelism.description: Default number of parallel workers (fibers/threads) to use.

context.description: Settings related to context enhancement and structure.

pathMappings.description: Mapping of aliases (like ~utils) to actual paths.

annotateKnownLibraries.description: Whether to try to detect and annotate code from known libraries (e.g., Shadcn UI).
